HairColor

  • melanin : BigDecimal
    The higher the value, the darker the hair strands are
  • redness : BigDecimal
    The higher the value, the redder the hair strands are
  • whiteness : BigDecimal
    Random variation of white strands
  • roughness : BigDecimal
    The higher the value, the more matte and less reflective the hair strands are
  • index_of_refraction : BigDecimal
    The higher the value, the more reflective are the hair strands
